span.em: Welcome to the Madison Local School District!
span.br: Madison Local Schools provides a challenging learning environment for each and every student. The PreK-12 academic demands are high to provide a greater opportunity for students after high school to be successful in any career path of their choice. Not only does Madison Local Schools provide a great PreK-12 experience, we also offer opportunities for adult education through the Madison Adult Career Center where competency-based instruction is provided for skill development…
